name: PIXEL PERFECT: 1-BIT BUIDLINGS PART 3
description:
1 BIT BUILDINGS KIT -  PART 3 >> PART OF THE PIXEL PERFECT COLLECTION <<

By Rad Potato 

Included - 
  • 30 Buildings included, enough for a small project!
  • All images and sprites are in PNG format    
  • Each Building is 1-BIT and 32 X 32 Pixels
  • Each building comes in a Non-Filled (no white) version, then a standard 1-BIT black and white version!
  • Sprite sheet with each building in both versions is included with the download, but also separated versions for each sprite!
  • A very random assortment of structures, like mushroom houses and cyberpunk sky scrapers!
  • third and likely final part in a series of free 32 x 32 pixel, 1-bit buildings!
CC0 License  - 
  • These can be used in anything,  commercially and non-commercially
  • Can be edited however you see fit
  • Credit is not mandatory, but always appreciated
  • But please, no repackaging and/or re-selling, thank you
Download Info - 
  • single zip file containing three folders, 1-BIT BUILDINGS (Fill), 1-BIT BUILDINGS (no-fill), and 1-BIT BUILDINGS (SpriteSheets)
  • A text document with a record of the license, and some other helpful info

Let me know how you like them! And thanks for checking them out! Enjoy! If you like free stuff and what you see here follow my page!
